TopicTitle: Huge FPS Drop in the VAB and SPH since the 1.0.2

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone !

Since the 1.0.2, I have a big FPS Drop in the VAB and the SPH. (~10-20 FPS).

But in the KSC view or when i'm flying, there is no problem (~40-60 FPS).

![745ff8f7fe.png](http://puu.sh/hz1OF/745ff8f7fe.png)

![b22b1eec37.jpg](http://puu.sh/hz1QC/b22b1eec37.jpg)

![f9b38c6723.jpg](http://puu.sh/hz1S0/f9b38c6723.jpg)

KSP Version: 1.0.2.842

Windows 7 Pro

Graphic card: GTX 670

Processor: Intel i7-2600k

RAM: 8GB

Mods: Clean install (no mods)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T11:35:17Z" title="05/03/2015 11:35  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by Panini**
  
Solved

Are you running the game in OpenGL mode by chance? I was having the same problem and it was caused by the Space Center Crew being rendered. If you rotate your view so you are looking at the back of the VAB does your frame rate jump back up? If so try turning off "Show Space Center Crew" under the General Tab under Settings from the main menu.

Yeah ! This is it !

Thanks a lot ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I don't know why the Space Center Crew of the 1.0.2 slows the FPS :/
